nodes.text: Kliyna Furthen was an individual that donated 2,000 credits to the Lightwind Orphanage on Tatooine at the time of the Galactic Civil War.

Kliyna Furthen was mentioned in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
